author: P O R F I R I A
text: You win some and you lose some. Hate that that happened especially on the last lap. Glad everyone is okay. @BubbaWallace did an amazing job as did everyone else. @23XIRacing @TALLADEGA

author: P O R F I R I A
text: People will always find away to hate on someone else’s success. Literally for no valid reason. @BubbaWallace is a good driver. https://t.co/8HwZ8MS2ek

author: P O R F I R I A
text: Accidents happen. Everyone accidentally comes a little too close doesn’t mean you have to give @BubbaWallace a hard time and he’s a damn good driver y’all literally find anything to nag him about. Let the man race. #Talladega

author: P O R F I R I A
text: This is what we love to see. Praying for @BubbaWallace win today https://t.co/ypLLoVYMvD
